item.title: About
item.description: My name is Daniel Martins and I’m a senior software engineer currently working as a SRE at Jusbrasil, one of the fastest growing LawTech startups in Brazil. I’m passionate about open source software, programming languages (specially the weird ones), machine learning, and pretty much any computer science magic you might think of. I currently live in Rio de Janeiro, although I was born and grew up near SÃ£o Paulo. When I’m not coding, I like to watch TV, listen to music, play the guitar, and have some beer with my friends.
